movie.title: The Polar Express
movie.plot: When a doubting young boy takes an extraordinary train ride to the North Pole, he embarks on a journey of self-discovery that shows him that the wonder of life never fades for those who believe.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 23 nominations.
